metadata.title: CVE-2024-28335 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Lektor before 3.3.11 does not sanitize DB path traversal. Thus, shellcommands might be executed via a file that is added to the templatesdirectory, if the victim's web browser accesses an untrusted website thatuses JavaScript to send requests to localhost port 5000, and the webbrowser is running on the same machine as the "lektor server" command.

criterions.comment: lektor package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
